name: StreamRolesAPI
description: Minimal HTTP API and dashboard frontend for the StreamRoles cog (exposes stats, export CSV and top endpoints). Requires the StreamRoles cog to be loaded in the same bot process.
install_msg: This cog provides an embedded HTTP API and a small dashboard for StreamRoles. Make sure StreamRoles is loaded in the same bot instance. Configure the API token per-guild with the command `streamrole setapitoken <token>`.
